name: 語言與社會
goals: to raise students' awareness to linguistic and socio-cultural issues in their everyday life
to raise students' awareness to linguistic and socio-cultural issues in their everyday life, and to cultivate their critical thinking skills
to cultivate their critical thinking skills

methodologies.note: 由授課老師講述各主題基本概念
由授課老師及學生共同提出問題，參與討論

以Do you speak American 紀錄片及其他社會語言相關影音及網路材料，引導學生思辨。

grading.note: 定期作業，主要目標為培養學生在日常生活中思考語言社會議題的能力。
期末筆試，評量上課學習狀況。
期末小組專題報告，培養學生合作學習及口頭發表的能力。

prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
